statements: SELECT * FROM learning_paths;
SELECT path_id, student_id FROM learning_paths WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM learning_paths ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT path_id, interests FROM learning_paths WHERE interests ->> 'topic' = 'Math';
SELECT * FROM learning_paths WHERE learning_style = 'Visual' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM learning_paths WHERE path_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, preferences, interests FROM learning_paths WHERE interests->>'subject' = 'Math';
SELECT path_id, student_id, learning_style FROM learning_paths WHERE preferences @> '{"level": "Intermediate"}';
SELECT student_id, path_id FROM learning_paths WHERE interests @> '{"subject": "Science", "level": "Advanced"}';
SELECT * FROM learning_paths WHERE learning_style = 'Visual' ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE learning_style = 'Visual';
SELECT course_name, category FROM courses WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE learning_style = 'Auditory' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE category = 'Science';
SELECT id, name, email FROM students WHERE learning_style = 'Visual';
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE category = 'Mathematics' ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_name LIKE '%Algebra%' AND category = 'Mathematics';
SELECT * FROM students JOIN courses ON students.id = courses.course_id WHERE courses.category = 'Science';
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE learning_style='Visual';
SELECT DISTINCT(topic) FROM courses;
SELECT student_id, course_id, completed FROM student_courses WHERE completed=true;
SELECT student_id, name, title, completed FROM students JOIN student_courses ON students.student_id = student_courses.student_id JOIN courses ON student_courses.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE learning_style = 'Visual';
SELECT course_id, title FROM courses WHERE topic = 'Science' ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT s.name AS student_name, c.title AS course_title FROM students s JOIN student_courses sc ON s.student_id = sc.student_id JOIN courses c ON sc.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT s.name AS student_name, c.title AS course_title FROM students s JOIN student_courses sc ON s.student_id = sc.student_id JOIN courses c ON sc.course_id = c.course_id WHERE sc.completed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM personalized_learning_paths;
SELECT student_id FROM personalized_learning_paths ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT preference_name, description FROM preferences WHERE preference_id = 1;
SELECT interest_name, description FROM interests WHERE description LIKE '%programming%';
SELECT style_name, description FROM learning_styles ORDER BY style_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM personalized_learning_paths WHERE student_id = 'f8d32540-0a90-4c70-8e0a-30fb1b1b7d85'
SELECT preference_name, description FROM preferences WHERE preference_id = 5
SELECT interest_name FROM interests WHERE description LIKE '%programming%' ORDER BY interest_name DESC
SELECT style_name, description FROM learning_styles WHERE style_name IN ('Visual', 'Auditory', 'Kinesthetic')
SELECT * FROM personalized_learning_paths JOIN interests ON personalized_learning_paths.student_id = interests.interest_id ORDER BY student_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT name, age FROM Students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT title, instructor, duration_hours FROM Courses WHERE duration_hours <= 10;
SELECT * FROM Preferences WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT student_id, interest FROM Interests ORDER BY student_id DESC, interest ASC;
SELECT student_id, name, email FROM Students;
SELECT title, instructor, duration_hours FROM Courses WHERE duration_hours > 10;
SELECT name, email, age, learning_style FROM Students WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT title, description, instructor FROM Courses WHERE description LIKE '%programming%';
SELECT student_id, course_id, rating, comment FROM Preferences WHERE rating >= 4;
